skillTree.name: Nightmare
skillTree.description: A Necromancer that can summon a Nightmare is no amateur in the black arts.

skillTree.name: Corpse Cart
skillTree.description: Devilish chariots imbued with dark and eldritch power, driving the Undead to greater, more macabre acts.

skillTree.name: Corpse Cart (Balefire)
skillTree.description: Infernal flames belch from dismal braziers, permeating the air with fragments of magic-confounding Warpstone.

skillTree.name: Corpse Cart (Unholy Lodestone)
skillTree.description: When the lodestone bell rings, dark magic exudes and ripples across the battlefield.

effects.description: Mount: Corpse Cart with Unholy Lodestone
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Raise Dead"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Raise Dead Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

effects.description: Spell number of uses: +2 for "Raise Dead" and "Raise Dead Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Dark Desires
skillTree.description: A lust for power guides him ever onward.

skillTree.name: Fell Rituals
skillTree.description: Wherever the Necromancer travels the taint of his passing blights the land and strengthens his horde.

skillTree.name: Ghoulish Tendencies
skillTree.description: How can a body so old and so decrepit move so quickly?

skillTree.name: Ghastly Ambitions
skillTree.description: The longer a Necromancer lives the stronger their hold over the undead grows, and the more frightening their magic becomes.

skillTree.name: Mend Flesh
skillTree.description: Improved binding rituals stitch flesh, bone, and sinew between battles.

skillTree.name: Stash of Organs
skillTree.description: The Necromancer supplements the diet of its ghoulish cohort with offal. The ghastly meal provides them increased strength.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +2% for Crypt Ghouls and Crypt Horrors units
Weapon strength: +4% for Crypt Ghouls and Crypt Horrors units
Weapon strength: +8% for Crypt Ghouls and Crypt Horrors units

skillTree.name: Let Them Roam
skillTree.description: Ghouls are more loyal and cheaper to feed if you allow them to go on the occasional hunt.

skillTree.name: Friends in Dark Places
skillTree.description: Believe it or not, the best carriages and skeletal steeds are often gifts from the local elite. This one's dark deeds have curried much favor.

effects.description: Armour: +2 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart, and Mortis Engine units
Charge bonus: +3% for Black Coach, Corpse Cart, and Mortis Engine units
Armour: +4 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart, and Mortis Engine units
Charge bonus: +6% for Black Coach, Corpse Cart, and Mortis Engine units
Armour: +8 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart, and Mortis Engine units
Charge bonus: +12% for Black Coach, Corpse Cart, and Mortis Engine units

skillTree.name: Ancient Binding Rituals
skillTree.description: This Necromancer has pushed the boundary of mortal knowledge to its limits, and uses ancient rituals to further bolster his forces.

effects.description: Melee defence: +2 for Corpse Cart units

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre Upgraded"

➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 100 200 damage and 100 50 explosion damage (2m)

➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 100 200 damage and 100 50 explosion damage (2m)
➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 100 200 damage and 100 50 explosion damage (2m)

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Gaze of Nagash"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Gaze of Nagash Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Gaze of Nagash Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Raise Dead Upgraded"

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of Years"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Wind of Death"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Power Sap
skillTree.description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5

skillTree.name: Experienced
skillTree.description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.

skillTree.name: Calming
skillTree.description: Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

skillTree.name: Quell
skillTree.description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -1
Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -3
Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -6

skillTree.name: Onslaught
skillTree.description: With the right amount of preparation, the winds can be harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

skillTree.name: Potent
skillTree.description: So great is this one’s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Unit
skillTree.description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 10% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 20% damage caused

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Dark Majesty
backgroundSkills.description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."

backgroundSkills.name: Devious
backgroundSkills.description: Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

backgroundSkills.name: Dread Incarnate
backgroundSkills.description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

backgroundSkills.name: Lore Keeper
backgroundSkills.description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

backgroundSkills.name: Master of the Black Arts
backgroundSkills.description: A master indeed - to rival the Great Necromancer himself?

ui_effects.description: ➕75% chance to deal 75 direct damage to 1 entity per second

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -10% for all spellcasters

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached
